about_the_game:
Is the mist playing with your eyes, or do you really see before you... a girl with a scorpion tail?

Runeflame is a top-down adventure puzzle RPG featuring archery that places you in a world of riddle magic and tangled conflicts between people and spirits.

Create a unique character from one of four fantasy races and begin to uncover the mysteries of this strange place. To make your way out of the fog, you must hone your skill with the bow and solve the puzzles that keep you trapped. And beyond the walls of your prison, what else will you discover?

Each adventure is a standalone module that your character can explore, and new modules for individual purchase will continually be added to expand the world. There are no other items to purchase in the game, only secrets for you to unearth with curiosity and logic.

Runeflame - a role-playing fantasy adventure game in the vein of old-school point-and-click adventures and computer RPGs.
